ai-anya-e0105n16:1_0: In such a dwelling place the Great Monastery of the Bhikkhus, having gone to Vihāras in the Mahāthūpa, and there the king shaved off their hair and beards, dressed in ocher robes, and had sex with the four gates, –
ai-anya-e0105n16:1_1: she made a dwelling, and then whipped her.
ai-anya-e0105n16:1_2: At that, the Great Ascetic, became well-known as a greater.
ai-anya-e0105n16:1_3: Then King Abhaya, having a good friend called Abhaya, the son of the foremost son, who gives me advice and followed his name, returned to the great assembly. And he returned to their four carpets.
